title: siva vAma bhAgEsvari
sahitya:
shiva vAma bhAgEshwari arum

tava shIlarum tozhum jagadIshwari amba  

anupallavi  

puviyOrkaruLpuriya purasait talam amarnda

bhuvanEshwari! shrI paramEshwari! amba  

caraNam  

mAtA nin sannidhi paNiyum sanmArgamE

nItAn enakkaruLa vENDum ammA � jaganmAtA

pAtALa ponni enum nAmam tanil malarnda

AdAra ezhil nAda madhurasattEn sindum  

madhyama kAlam  

sAma gAna mOhini undan

mahimai pugala taramO unnada

(shiva)
